about_the_game:
Feel the charm of ancient history on the banks of the Selenge in Mongolia! Try your luck in catching the river’s unique inhabitants with our new Taimen Khan Pack! This set contains everything you need to catch the king of salmon — Taimen! A sturdy spinning rod, an incredibly powerful and capacious reel, a set of high-quality lures and baits, as well as unique and authentic items of equipment — a Mongolian hat and a special fishing coat. A 7-day Pass to the Selenge River is also included in the bundle to make your trip unforgettable!

Taimen Khan Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 5 Marker Buoys
* 50 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* MagFin™ RiverSpear 230 SE - Length: 7' 6" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 7/64–1/2 Oz (3–14 g); Power: Light; Line Weight: 24.3–52.9 Lb (11–24.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 11
* RIVERTEX™ Thetis™ 7' 6" (230) SE - Length: 7' 6" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz (18–56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 24–60 Lb (11–27.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 9

Reels:
* MagFin™ Ultimate Roller 3000S SE - Ratio: 6; Recovery: 39.3" (100 cm); Capacity: Mono 12/100 (0.3/100), Braid 20/135 (0.23/135); Max Drag: 52.9 Lb (24 kg); Drag: Front
* RIVERTEX™ Empress™ 7000 SE - Ratio: 5.1; Recovery: 47" (120 cm); Capacity: Mono 37/120 (0.6/120), Braid 36/215 (0.3/215); Max Drag: 55.5 Lb (25.2 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Mono .026" (0.65 mm) - Test: 50.7 Lb (23 kg)
Fluoro .028" (0.7 mm) - Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
Fluorocarbon Leader .028" (0.7 mm) (x10) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
Fluorocarbon Leader .028" (0.7 mm) (x10) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 53 Lb (24 kg)
* Walkers: Mouse Lure 3/4 Oz (21 g), #3/0 (x4), Mouse Lure 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #5/0 (x4), Mouse Lure 1 5/7 Oz (48 g), #7/0 (x4)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft. (1 m), #3/0 (x2), Crankbait 6 ft. (2 m), #5/0 (x2), Crankbait 8 ft. (2.5 m), #6/0 (x2), Mini Crank 3 ft (1 m), 1/4 Oz (7 g) #1/0 (x4), Mini Crank 3 ft (1 m), 1/3 Oz (9 g), #2/0 (x4), Mini Crank 3 ft, 3/7 Oz (12 g), #3/0 (x4)
* Minnows: Hunched Runner 3 ft (1 m), #1/0 (x2), Hunched Runner 3 ft (1 m), #4/0 (x2), Hunched Runner 8 ft (2.5 m), #2/0 (x2), Hunched Runner 8 ft (2.5 m), #6/0 (x2), Triple Runner 3 ft(1 m), #2/0 (x2), Triple Runner 3 ft(1 m), #4/0 (x2), Triple Runner 8 ft(2.5 m), #3/0 (x2), Triple Runner 8 ft(2.5 m), #5/0 (x2)
* Spoons: Nano Spoon 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x15), Narrow Spoon 1 Oz (28 g), #4/0 (x20)
* Jig Heads: JigHead 1/3 Oz (9 g), #2/0 (x5), JigHead 1/3 Oz (9 g), #3/0 (x5), JigHead 1/3 Oz (9 g), #6/0 (x5)
* Soft Baits: Shad 6" (15 cm) (x20), Minnow Grub 3" (7 cm) (x30)

EQUIPMENT
* Mongolian Deel - Tackles: 15; Lines: 5
* Mongolian Hat - Tackles: 4
* Garry Scott™ FishCitadel L Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 220 Lb (100 kg); Total Fish Weight: 551 Lb (250 kg)

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Mongolia License

Selenge River Pass (7 Day)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent

  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
